sn56.13:1.3: Dukkham ariyasaccam, dukkhasamudayam ariyasaccam, dukkhanirodham ariyasaccam dukkhanirodhagamini patipada ariyasaccam.
sn56.13:3.2: Yayam tanha ponobbhavika nandiragasahagata tatratatrabhinandini, seyyathidam—
sn56.13:4.2: Yo tassayeva tanhaya asesaviraganirodho cago patinissaggo mutti analayo—
sn56.13:5.4: idam vuccati, bhikkhave, dukkhanirodhagamini patipada ariyasaccam.
sn56.13:6.1: Tasmatiha, bhikkhave, ‘idam dukkhan’ti yogo karaniyo …pe… ‘ayam dukkhanirodhagamini patipada’ti yogo karaniyo”ti.
